sqls.sql: create table if not exists position ( ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, PUBLISHER INTEGER, COMPANY INTEGER, POST_DATE DATETIME, LOCATION VARCHAR(256), WORK_YEAR INTEGER, QUANTITY INTEGER, LOWEST_DEGREE VARCHAR(128), FUNCTION TEXT, DETAIL TEXT, SKILL TEXT, SALARY VARCHAR(64) )
create table if not exists account ( ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, USERNAME VARCHAR(64), EMAIL VARCHAR(128), MOBILE_PHONE VARCHAR(16), PASSWORD VARCHAR(128) )
create table if not exists company ( ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, NAME VARCHAR(64), ADDRESS VARCHAR(256), INDUSTRY VARCHAR(128), STRUCTURE VARCHAR(16), SCALE VARCHAR(32) )

create table if not exists contact ( ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, EMAIL VARCHAR(128), PHONE VARCHAR(16), MOBILE_PHONE VARCHAR(16), QQ VARCHAR(16), WEIXIN VARCHAR(32), RESIDENCE VARCHAR(256), LOCATION VARCHAR(256) )
create table if not exists education ( ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, BEGIN_DATE DATETIME, END_DATE DATETIME, SCHOOL VARCHAR(64), MAJOR VARCHAR(64), DETAIL VARCHAR(128) )
create table if not exists jobtarget ( ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, INDUSTRY VARCHAR(64), POSITION VARCHAR(64), WORK_CITY VARCHAR(64), EXPECT_SALARY VARCHAR(16) )

create table if not exists resume ( ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, USER INTEGER, CONTACT INTEGER, EDUCATIONS VARCHAR(256),--逗号分隔的education表id WORK_EXPS VARCHAR(256),--逗号分隔的workexp表id SKILL_DETAIL VARCHAR(1024), EXP_DETAIL TEXT, JOB_TARGET INTEGER )

create table if not exists user ( ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, NAME VARCHAR(64), SEX INTEGER, BIRTHDAY DATE, ID_TYPE INTEGER, ID_NUM VARCHAR(64), DEGREE INTEGER, MAJOR VARCHAR(64), ENGLISH_LEVEL INTEGER, WORK_YEAR INTEGER, CREATE_DATE DATETIME, MODIFY_DATE DATETIME, ACCOUNT INTEGER )

create table if not exists workexp ( ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, COMPANY VARCHAR(64), POSITION VARCHAR(64), ON_JOB INTEGER, BEGIN DATE, END DATE, SALARY INTEGER, IS_PRIVATE INTEGER, DETAIL TEXT )

create table if not exists message ( ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, TITLE VARCHAR(64), CONTENT VARCHAR(128 ), SENDER_ID INTEGER, SENDER_NAME VARCHAR(64), RECEIVER_ID INTEGER, RECEIVER_NAME VARCHAR(64), TYPE VARCHAR(64), CREATED_DATE DATE )
